content.text: how do subnets work in bittensor?

Subnets in bittensor are specialized networks designed for specific AI tasks. Each subnet consists of validators and miners working on defined objectives - for example, Subnet 1 handles language processing while Subnet 3 focuses on image processing. Validators stake TAO tokens to incentivize miners who provide the best-performing AI models. The key components are: 1) The incentive mechanism that rewards quality contributions, 2) The validation process that measures performance, and 3) The consensus system that ensures network integrity. Would you like me to explain any of these components in more detail?
my validator isn't working properly, any advice?

Let's troubleshoot systematically: 1) Check your subtensor connection status, 2) Verify your dependencies are up to date, 3) Review your scoring mechanism alignment with subnet requirements, 4) Examine your logs for any error patterns. Could you share your specific error messages or logs? That would help me provide more targeted assistance. Also, make sure you're running the latest version of the subnet's codebase.
